metadata.title: CVE-2024-40929 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: check n_ssids before accessing the ssidsIn some versions of cfg80211, the ssids poinet might be a valid one eventhough n_ssids is 0. Accessing the pointer in this case will cuase anout-of-bound access. Fix this by checking n_ssids first.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40929` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
